MajorClaims.Text: Many circumstances that I experienced change the way I think
experiences that shape my thinking and the way to live my life are teach me to be a better person

Claims.Text: These experiences taught me to change my life to be a better person
There are many experiences that are improve my life in many way
studying in university taught me to be more prudent person to solve problems
Some experiences could teach me the way to take care of myself
experiences are also change to plan for my future life

Premises.Text: I could find a better way to solve problems
experiences could shape me to be more aware about my health
these experiences could make me to make plan for my future life
I could improve the way that I solve problems, improve how I take care of my health, and improve to plan my life for future
in math class, the way that we learnt to find an answer by doing step by step
Start with find cause of problem and the way to do research to solve the problem
I could adapt this method to use my real life
When I want to go to somewhere, I try to find the way to reach to destination
Which ways are shortest and which ways are less consume my time
I could find a better way to solve problems
This experience teach me to aware my health
reading and listening the news about choosing a good diet are the way to keep myself are more healthy
I am always buy a quality food such as organic food
This food are not have chemical
I can have a good health
This experience change me to concern about making plan for my future life
I read about saving money for my retire is a good plan for my life
I start changing myself from spending many thing that I want to saving money for my entire life
